ideal_force_range.description: Minimal force required to slice or cut without deforming the object.
Moderate force needed to cut through firm but not hard textures.
Significant force required to penetrate and slice through tough materials.
High force necessary for cutting through dense and hard structures.
Light to moderate force needed depending on thickness and tool sharpness.
Moderate force required to cut flexible materials with clean edges.
Moderate force sufficient for slicing or cutting thin, flexible plastic.
Higher force required for clean and precise cuts without splintering.
